original_title: Ghosts of Karabakh: Armenia and Azerbaijan's Tense Ceasefire
overview: In just 44 days of fighting, more than 5000 soldiers and at least 143 civilians were killed in the recent war for Nagorno Karabakh​ / Artsakh​. Tens of thousands have been displaced, many people are still missing, and bodies are still being found.
title: Ghosts of Karabakh: Armenia and Azerbaijan's Tense Ceasefire
